snippet: Mr. Bailey’s magazine became known as the gold standard of “automotive literature,” in his phrase — a cross between The New Yorker and the Encyclopaedia Britannica.
abstract: L Scott Bailey, founder of periodical Automobile Quarterly, dies at age 87.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Bailey’s magazine became known as the gold standard of “automotive literature,” in his phrase — a cross between The New Yorker and the Encyclopaedia Britannica.

headline.seo: L. Scott Bailey, Founder of Automobile Quarterly, Dies at 87
headline.main: L. Scott Bailey, Founder of Automobile Quarterly, Dies at 87
headline.print_headline: L. Scott Bailey, 87, Founder of Auto Periodical
